links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1).
mathematica: a[0] := 1; a[1] := 1; a[2] = 5; a[n_] := a[n] =a[n - 1] + a[n - 3]; Table[a[n], {n, 50}] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Dec 05 2011 *)LinearRecurrence[{1,0,1},{1,1,5},40] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 09 2012 *)
author: Juan-Carlos Lerman (jclerm(AT)aztec.asu.edu)
